channel.title: Problem with rights level 3
channel.description: from looking around i saw that if i want to be the owner of my server, (i use warscape base) i have to go into client.java and edit the serverowner name from slysoft to the name i wanna use. i did that and when i made my account, i didn't have and crowns but when i logged into slysoft he was still the owner with mod rights 3. i did save. after that i went to my character's file and changed his rights to 3 but when i logged in it went back to 0. after that i logged into slysoft and used the ::nick command to change his name to mine and i also renamed all his files to my name but when i logged in, i was still mod rights 0. i have no idea whats left to do. also if you give me a working answer and tell how to rep+ then i will rep+ you.

item.title: Problem with rights level 3
item.dc:creator: @youknowho youknowho
item.description:
@youknowho wrote:

I had same problem! Okay, log out. Take your file out, edit rights to 2. Log in. Talk and see crown. Log out. Open and re-edit to 3. Save. Log in. Tada.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with rights level 3
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

it’s simple you want to be admin right? all you gotta do is go into the client search for admin mod list and once you see it the first one should be the admin player rights 3 now change his name to your characters name then compile go back on then you’ll be admin. if you want to you crown simply

open client then find this

out.write(playerRights);

then replace with this

if (playerRights == 3) {
out.write(2); //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

there you’re admin[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 05:55:12 PM[/size][hr]if you didn’t know you gotta compile it o.o (IF YOU DIDNT KNOW I MEAN YOU MIGHT OF)

Read full topic

hmm if this is about help making you owner then all u have to do is go to characters folder, search for ur username and then change the PlayerRights = 0 to PlayerRights = 3

item.title: Problem with rights level 3
item.dc:creator: @aaa801 aaa801
item.description:
@aaa801 wrote:

i got the code
all credit 2 Sepranem
owners can also see their own crown, you just have to add a bugfix:

open client.java, search for

out.write(playerRights);
then REPLACE that line with

Code:

if (playerRights == 3) {
out.write(2);      //Crown fixup
} else {
out.write(playerRights); // mod level
}

that’ll let owners see their own crown (which is the only playerRights group that can’t otherwise)

hope ya like

~Sepranem~

Read full topic
